## TextureAtlasManager.pushCanvas() method

Inserts a rectangle of a canvas to the atlas texture

**Signature:**

```typescript
pushCanvas(key: string, ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D, x: number, y: number, w: number, h: number): AtlasInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Key of the atlas |
|  ctx | CanvasRenderingContext2D | The canvas context |
|  x | number | x offset of the rectangle |
|  y | number | y offset of the rectangle |
|  w | number | width of the rectangle |
|  h | number | height of the rectangle |

**Returns:**

[AtlasInfo](doc/markdown/./device.atlasinfo.md)

The atals info or null if insert failed
